title: Laptop penetration in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2009 to 2019
summary: Overall Percentage of population has decreased over the Year.
Percentage of population is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2018, and finally slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 66.0 was reported at Year 2013
The lowest Percentage of population, of value 60.0 was reported at Year 2019
min_summary: In general Percentage of population has stayed the same over the Year.
Percentage of population is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2018, and finally slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019.
